page.title: 16 HOUSING
page.content: FOLLOWING THE GOVERNMENT'S DECISION TO ALLOW TENANTS LIVING IN RENTED ACCOMODATION TO BUY THEIR HOMES,54 COUNCIL,44 SSHA.AND 4 NCB HOUSES HAVE BEEN BOUGHT BY THE OCCUPANTS.NO NEW HOUSES EXCEPT A FEW SINGLE PRIVATE HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT IN GOREBRIDGE SINCE 1975 BUT THE COUNCIL HAVE CARRIED OUT EXTENSIVE MODERNISATION WORK SINCE THEN AS HAVE THE SSHA.74 NCB HOUSES HAVE BEEN DEMOLISHED BETWEEN 1978-84 ALSO GREENHALL FARM HOUSE.70 2-APARTMENT HOUSES FOR THE USE OF THE ELDERLY IN WOODROW,VOGRIE AND GREENHALL RD.BIELD HOUSING ASSOC. ARE NEGOTIATING WITH ARNISTON ESTATES FOR THE PURCHASE OF GROUND AT DUNDAS STREET FOR 22 SHELTERED HOUSING UNITS AND CASTLE ROCK HOUSING ASSOC. ARE ACQUIRING GROUND AT HUNTERFIELD TER. FOR THE SAME PURPOSE BUT THE NUMBER OF UNITS IS AS YET UNKNOWN.
